title: The Mailman's Hat
description: Who knew that delivering mail could be so eventful? The Mailman's Hat is a fictional story about a mailman who runs into a problem daily with an unruly dog on his mail route. The dog barks, bites, and even holds the mailman's hat hostage. Students will have the opportunity to identify the problem and its solution as well as the proper use of names of people.
highFrequencyWords: gusty, mailman, porch, pouch, shreds, treat
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.

phonics: Alphabetical Order                : Arrange words in alphabetical order
